constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 126 (Monday, July 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MAST:
H.R. 4528.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H3669]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To direct the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to study the feasibility of establishing a pilot program to assign certain officers of the Armed Forces to serve as directors of medical centers of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
